contents.title: You handle the booking, we'll take it from there
contents.description: Unlike other travel apps, TripIt can organize your travel plans no matter where you book. Simply forward your confirmation emails to plans@tripit.com and in a matter of seconds, TripIt will create a comprehensive itinerary for every trip.
contents.quote: "I'm on the road 100 days a year and TripIt is my go-to-app. It's such a powerful tool in the hands of a traveler. There's simply nothing like it on the planet."
contents.author: Damen L

contents.title: Helpful reminders and alerts so you don't miss a beat
contents.description: Packed with features that give you a leg up on changes and help you make the most of all your trips, TripIt Pro is where the magic happens.
contents.quote: "I love knowing exactly when my flights are, when they are delayed, what gate to leave from, and all the other amazing TripIt Pro features."
contents.author: Ann B

contents.title: Know where to be and when
contents.description: Need a reminder when it's time to leave for the airport? Not sure where to eat in the airport or near your hotel? TripIt has you covered.
contents.quote: "My favorite business travel app so far is TripIt. Carrying all of my itineraries, it saves me during my 'Where am I, what do I do next?' panic attacks."
contents.author: Phil D
